mapper.update: update mg_config_data set config_name = #{configName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, config_type = #{configType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, config_value = #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where config_id = #{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select config_id, config_name, config_type, config_value, insert_by, insert_time from mg_config_data
